languages.text: "Мы обнаружили, что когитатор стал барахлить после несанкционированной попытки доступа. Кто-то нарочно прогневал духа машины, пытаясь скрыть логи работ. К счастью, почтенная техножрица смогла умилостивить духа и добыть информацию".

traits.locale_text: "Мы обнаружили, что когитатор стал барахлить после несанкционированной попытки доступа. Кто-то нарочно прогневал духа машины, пытаясь скрыть логи работ. К счастью, почтенная техножрица смогла умилостивить духа и добыть информацию".

languages.text: "We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."
languages.original_text: "Мы обнаружили, что когитатор стал барахлить после несанкционированной попытки доступа. Кто-то нарочно прогневал духа машины, пытаясь скрыть логи работ. К счастью, почтенная техножрица смогла умилостивить духа и добыть информацию".

Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

"We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

"We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the Just-Logicarius was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

"We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the Just-Logicarius was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

"We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

"We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

languages.text: « Nous avons découvert que le cogitateur a commencé à se détraquer après une tentative d'accès non autorisée. Quelqu'un a délibérément provoqué la colère de l'esprit afin de faire disparaître les registres du personnel. Par chance, l'honorable technoprêtresse a réussi à l'apaiser afin d'en extraire les informations nécessaires. »
languages.original_text: "We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons découvert que le cogitateur a commencé à se détraquer après une tentative d'accès non autorisée. Quelqu'un a délibérément provoqué la colère de l'esprit afin de faire disparaître les registres du personnel. Par chance, la juste-logicarius a réussi à l'apaiser afin d'en extraire les informations nécessaires. »

languages.text: «Hemos descubierto que los fallos del cogitador comenzaron después de un intento no autorizado de acceder a él. Alguien enfadó a propósito al espíritu máquina para ocultar los registros de trabajo. Por suerte, la tecnosacerdotisa consiguió apaciguar al espíritu y extraer la información que necesitamos».
languages.original_text: "We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos descubierto que los fallos del cogitador comenzaron después de un intento no autorizado de acceder a él. Alguien enfadó a propósito al espíritu máquina para ocultar los registros de trabajo. Por suerte, la Justi-Logicarius consiguió apaciguar al espíritu y extraer la información que necesitamos».

languages.text: “我们发现，有人对沉思者进行了未经授权的访问尝试，在这之后沉思者才发生了故障。有人故意惹怒了机魂，想要让工作日志彻底无法访问。好消息是，尊敬的技术神甫成功地安抚了机魂，提取出了我们想要的信息。”
languages.original_text: "We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

traits.locale_text: “我们发现，有人对沉思者进行了未经授权的访问尝试，在这之后沉思者才发生了故障。有人故意惹怒了机魂，想要让工作日志彻底无法访问。好消息是，裁决逻辑士成功地安抚了机魂，提取出了我们想要的信息。”

languages.text: 「考算機が誤作動を起こすようになったのは、無許可で考算機にアクセスしようとしたことが原因です。誰かが故意に機械精霊を怒らせたのです。きっと、作業ログを埋めるためでしょう。ありがたいことに、技術司祭はその霊をなだめ、必要な情報を引き出すことができました」
languages.original_text: "We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

traits.locale_text: 「考算機が誤作動を起こすようになったのは、無許可で考算機にアクセスしようとしたことが原因です。誰かが故意に機械霊を怒らせたのです。きっと、作業ログを埋めるためでしょう。ありがたいことに、ジャスト・ロジカリウスはその霊をなだめ、必要な情報を引き出すことができました。」

languages.text: "Wir haben festgestellt, dass die Fehlfunktionen des Cogitators nach einem unbefugten Zugriffsversuch begonnen haben. Jemand hat den Maschinengeist bewusst erzürnt, um die Arbeitslogs zu begraben. Glücklicherweise konnte die verehrte Techpriesterin den Geist besänftigen und die benötigten Informationen extrahieren."
languages.original_text: "We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben festgestellt, dass die Fehlfunktionen des Cogitators nach einem unbefugten Zugriffsversuch begonnen haben. Jemand hat den Maschinengeist bewusst erzürnt, um die Arbeitslogs zu begraben. Glücklicherweise konnte die Just-Logicarius den Geist besänftigen und die benötigten Informationen extrahieren."

languages.text: "Kavramsayar arızalarının yetkisiz bir erişim teşebbüsünün ardından başladığını keşfettik. Birisi, çalışma kayıtlarını gizlemek için kasti olarak makine ruhunu öfkelendirmiş. Neyse ki muhterem Tekno Rahip, ruhu sakinleştirip ihtiyacımız olan bilgiyi çıkarmayı başardı."
languages.original_text: "We have discovered that the cogitator's malfunctions began after an unauthorised attempt to access it was made. Someone deliberately angered the machine spirit in order to bury the work logs. Thankfully, the esteemed Tech-Priest was able to appease the spirit and extract the information we needed."
